system.description:
You have learned the tales of the natural world and can shout them from the proverbial—or actual—mountaintops even when out of your humanoid form. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Wisdom score improves by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • You can maintain a Battle Hymn or impart Bardic Inspiration while wild shaped.

  • You learn the following special Battle Hymn, which does not count against your battle hymns known

    • Chorus of Nature. The creature gains immunity to poison and disease

  • You are proficient with the Performance skill. If you are already proficient, you gain an expertise die. You also gain a Performance skill specialty with Speaking.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in bard, 3 levels in druid
